name: Jackson's Basics In Gaming & Crabs V1.4

description:
A Baldi's Basics mod using Jackson - itch.io , Me, (CircleyAnimations), and many other characters me and Jackson has made as the characters.

Character Credits: Crystal and Calculator - From My Show FOFC on YT (Search CircleyAnimations) Everett - (he doesnt use itch io) Cursed Broom - (its literally a picture of my broom irl) Jackson - Jackson - itch.io Circley Animations - (i am circleyanimations)
